description: Extension of existing basement to create additional storage area; alteration to windows and doors and lower ground floor; Alterations to windows and doors, creation of steps to garden and construction of steel framed stair case at ground floor; Extension of existing first floor terrace and installation of two walk on rooflights within second existing terrace at first floor; Installation of skylight above first floor bathroom; Installation of dormer windows within north (x1) and south (x2) facades of existing third floor dormer roof extension.
decision_conditions:
To assist applicants the Local Planning Authority has produced policies and written guidance, all of which is available on the Councilâ€™s website. 

A pre-planning application advice service is also offered and encouraged. 

In this instance the pre-application advice provided to the applicant was not adhered to, therefore the LPA determined the application in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of the NPPF.

The LPA invites the applicant to enter into collaborative pre-planning application discussions to assist in the preparation of a new planning application.
